comment: He didnt help with anything. He yelled at me when labflow messed up my section. He doesnt even grade the quizzes.

He mumbles quite often, he speaks way too fast and flies through his PowerPoints. On every test/quiz, there were several instances of the questions being VERY unclear. He's a nice person, but when you have to curve every test by 20+ points, there's something wrong with your teaching style.
Pretty laid back guy and was so so nice! I highly recommend this class if youre looking for a high grade.

The worst professor I have ever had. He pushed class back 30 minutes because he couldn't get there on time, then he would still show up late up to 25 minutes after the already pushed back time. Despite pushing back the start time he would rush you to still finish the lab by the original end time. Doesn't explain lab. Doesn't answer ?s DO NOT TAKE.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK
